channel.title: Cache help
channel.description: How do i make it so when it downloads the cache to your c:/ drive, It will read it from the c drive. If i dont have the cache in my client it doesnt work but when its in my client it works fine. I have my cachedownloader working but i can't seem to find out so it reads it from the c:/ drive. Help?
